articles.author: India Today Sports Desk
articles.title: Ravi Shastri doesn't see KL Rahul to be a part of playing XI in the Asia Cup: That's a no no - India Today
articles.description: Former India coach Ravi Shastri feels that KL Rahul shouldn't be a part of the playing eleven for the upcoming Asia Cup 2023 as the Indian batter continues his rehabilitation from injury. Rahul is still a doubt for the Asia Cup and World Cup.
articles.content: Former India coach Ravi Shastri has said that he wouldn't consider KL Rahul to be a part of the playing eleven for the upcoming Asia Cup 2023 as the Indian batter continues his recovery from injury.… [+1580 chars]
